title: champs ,runes and  masteries disappearing in champ select
body: served 3 leaver bans for something I can do nothing about

replies.body:
Is this also where your countdown timer shows a constant 0 regardless of time passing by? If so, this is definitely caused by a *poor or unstable connection* to the matchmaking servers. I recommend you work through the steps listed inside our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), as those steps usually resolve these issues.

Let me know if this resolved your issues or not.
